members.name: isLocationAvailable
members.description: Checks if app is able to access device location.

members.name: isWifiAvailable
members.description: Checks if Wifi is connected/enabled. On iOS this returns true if the device is connected to a network by WiFi. On Android and Windows 10 Mobile this returns true if the WiFi setting is set to enabled.On Android this requires permission. `<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE" />`

members.name: isCameraAvailable
members.description: Checks if the device has a camera. On Android this returns true if the device has a camera. On iOS this returns true if both the device has a camera AND the application is authorized to use it. On Windows 10 Mobile this returns true if both the device has a rear-facing camera AND theapplication is authorized to use it.

params.name: externalStorage
params.description: Android only: If true, checks permission for READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE in addition to CAMERA run-time permission. cordova-plugin-camera@2.2+ requires both of these permissions. Defaults to true.

members.name: isBluetoothAvailable
members.description: Checks if the device has Bluetooth capabilities and if so that Bluetooth is switched on (same on Android, iOS and Windows 10 Mobile)On Android this requires permission <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.BLUETOOTH" />

members.name: switchToLocationSettings
members.description: Displays the device location settings to allow user to enable location services/change location mode.

members.name: switchToMobileDataSettings
members.description: Displays mobile settings to allow user to enable mobile data.

members.name: switchToBluetoothSettings
members.description: Displays Bluetooth settings to allow user to enable Bluetooth.

members.name: switchToWifiSettings
members.description: Displays WiFi settings to allow user to enable WiFi.

members.name: isWifiEnabled
members.description: Returns true if the WiFi setting is set to enabled, and is the same as `isWifiAvailable()`

members.name: setWifiState
members.description: Enables/disables WiFi on the device.Requires `ACCESS_WIFI_STATE` and `CHANGE_WIFI_STATE` permissions on Android

members.name: setBluetoothState
members.description: Enables/disables Bluetooth on the device.Requires `BLUETOOTH` and `BLUETOOTH_ADMIN` permissions on Android

members.name: isLocationEnabled
members.description: Returns true if the device setting for location is on. On Android this returns true if Location Mode is switched on. On iOS this returns true if Location Services is switched on.

members.name: isLocationAuthorized
members.description: Checks if the application is authorized to use location.Note for Android: this is intended for Android 6 / API 23 and above. Calling on Android 5 / API 22 and below will always return GRANTED status as permissions are already granted at installation time.

members.name: getLocationAuthorizationStatus
members.description: Returns the location authorization status for the application.

members.name: requestLocationAuthorization
members.description: Returns the location authorization status for the application.Note for Android: this is intended for Android 6 / API 23 and above. Calling on Android 5 / API 22 and below will always return GRANTED status as permissions are already granted at installation time.

params.name: mode
params.description: iOS only: location authorization mode: "always" or "when_in_use". If not specified, defaults to "when_in_use".

members.name: isCameraPresent
members.description: Checks if camera hardware is present on device.

members.name: isCameraAuthorized
members.description: Checks if the application is authorized to use the camera.Note for Android: this is intended for Android 6 / API 23 and above. Calling on Android 5 / API 22 and below will always return TRUE as permissions are already granted at installation time.

params.name: externalStorage
params.description: Android only: If true, checks permission for READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE in addition to CAMERA run-time permission. cordova-plugin-camera@2.2+ requires both of these permissions. Defaults to true.

members.name: getCameraAuthorizationStatus
members.description: Returns the camera authorization status for the application.

params.name: externalStorage
params.description: Android only: If true, checks permission for READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE in addition to CAMERA run-time permission. cordova-plugin-camera@2.2+ requires both of these permissions. Defaults to true.

members.name: requestCameraAuthorization
members.description: Requests camera authorization for the application.

params.name: externalStorage
params.description: Android only: If true, requests permission for READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE in addition to CAMERA run-time permission. cordova-plugin-camera@2.2+ requires both of these permissions. Defaults to true.

members.name: isMicrophoneAuthorized
members.description: Checks if the application is authorized to use the microphone.

members.name: getMicrophoneAuthorizationStatus
members.description: Returns the microphone authorization status for the application.

members.name: requestMicrophoneAuthorization
members.description: Requests microphone authorization for the application.

members.name: isContactsAuthorized
members.description: Checks if the application is authorized to use contacts (address book).

members.name: getContactsAuthorizationStatus
members.description: Returns the contacts authorization status for the application.

members.name: requestContactsAuthorization
members.description: Requests contacts authorization for the application.

members.name: isCalendarAuthorized
members.description: Checks if the application is authorized to use the calendar.Notes for Android:  - This is intended for Android 6 / API 23 and above. Calling on Android 5 / API 22 and below will always return TRUE as permissions are already granted at installation time.Notes for iOS:  - This relates to Calendar Events (not Calendar Reminders)

members.name: getCalendarAuthorizationStatus
members.description: Returns the calendar authorization status for the application.Notes for Android:  - This is intended for Android 6 / API 23 and above. Calling on Android 5 / API 22 and below will always return `GRANTED` status as permissions are already granted at installation time.Notes for iOS:  - This relates to Calendar Events (not Calendar Reminders)

members.name: requestCalendarAuthorization
members.description: Requests calendar authorization for the application.Notes for iOS:  - Should only be called if authorization status is NOT_DETERMINED. Calling it when in any other state will have no effect and just return the current authorization status.  - This relates to Calendar Events (not Calendar Reminders)Notes for Android:  - This is intended for Android 6 / API 23 and above. Calling on Android 5 / API 22 and below will have no effect as the permissions are already granted at installation time.  - This requests permission for `READ_CALENDAR` run-time permission  - Required permissions must be added to `AndroidManifest.xml` as appropriate - see Android permissions: `READ_CALENDAR`, `WRITE_CALENDAR`

members.name: switchToSettings
members.description: Opens settings page for this app.On Android, this opens the "App Info" page in the Settings app.On iOS, this opens the app settings page in the Settings app. This works only on iOS 8+ - iOS 7 and below will invoke the errorCallback.

members.name: getBluetoothState
members.description: Returns the state of Bluetooth on the device.

members.name: registerBluetoothStateChangeHandler
members.description: Registers a function to be called when a change in Bluetooth state occurs.

members.name: registerLocationStateChangeHandler
members.description: Registers a function to be called when a change in Location state occurs.

members.name: isGpsLocationAvailable
members.description: Checks if high-accuracy locations are available to the app from GPS hardware.Returns true if Location mode is enabled and is set to "Device only" or "High accuracy" AND if the app is authorised to use location.

members.name: isGpsLocationEnabled
members.description: Checks if location mode is set to return high-accuracy locations from GPS hardware.  Returns true if Location mode is enabled and is set to either:  - Device only = GPS hardware only (high accuracy)  - High accuracy = GPS hardware, network triangulation and Wifi network IDs (high and low accuracy)

members.name: isNetworkLocationAvailable
members.description: Checks if low-accuracy locations are available to the app from network triangulation/WiFi access points.Returns true if Location mode is enabled and is set to "Battery saving" or "High accuracy" AND if the app is authorised to use location.

members.name: isNetworkLocationEnabled
members.description: Checks if location mode is set to return low-accuracy locations from network triangulation/WiFi access points.Returns true if Location mode is enabled and is set to either:  - Battery saving = network triangulation and Wifi network IDs (low accuracy)  - High accuracy = GPS hardware, network triangulation and Wifi network IDs (high and low accuracy)

members.name: getLocationMode
members.description: Returns the current location mode setting for the device.

members.name: getPermissionAuthorizationStatus
members.description: Returns the current authorisation status for a given permission.Note: this is intended for Android 6 / API 23 and above. Calling on Android 5 / API 22 and below will always return GRANTED status as permissions are already granted at installation time.

members.name: getPermissionsAuthorizationStatus
members.description: Returns the current authorisation status for multiple permissions.Note: this is intended for Android 6 / API 23 and above. Calling on Android 5 / API 22 and below will always return GRANTED status as permissions are already granted at installation time.

members.name: requestRuntimePermission
members.description: Requests app to be granted authorisation for a runtime permission.Note: this is intended for Android 6 / API 23 and above. Calling on Android 5 / API 22 and below will have no effect as the permissions are already granted at installation time.

members.name: requestRuntimePermissions
members.description: Requests app to be granted authorisation for multiple runtime permissions.Note: this is intended for Android 6 / API 23 and above. Calling on Android 5 / API 22 and below will always return GRANTED status as permissions are already granted at installation time.

members.name: isRequestingPermission
members.description: Indicates if the plugin is currently requesting a runtime permission via the native API.Note that only one request can be made concurrently because the native API cannot handle concurrent requests,so the plugin will invoke the error callback if attempting to make more than one simultaneous request.Multiple permission requests should be grouped into a single call since the native API is setup to handle batch requests of multiple permission groups.

members.name: registerPermissionRequestCompleteHandler
members.description: Registers a function to be called when a runtime permission request has completed.Pass in a falsey value to de-register the currently registered function.

members.name: isBluetoothEnabled
members.description: Checks if the device setting for Bluetooth is switched on.This requires `BLUETOOTH` permission on Android

members.name: hasBluetoothSupport
members.description: Checks if the device has Bluetooth capabilities.

members.name: hasBluetoothLESupport
members.description: Checks if the device has Bluetooth Low Energy (LE) capabilities.

members.name: hasBluetoothLEPeripheralSupport
members.description: Checks if the device supports Bluetooth Low Energy (LE) Peripheral mode.

members.name: isExternalStorageAuthorized
members.description: Checks if the application is authorized to use external storage.

members.name: getExternalStorageAuthorizationStatus
members.description: CReturns the external storage authorization status for the application.

members.name: requestExternalStorageAuthorization
members.description: Requests external storage authorization for the application.

members.name: getExternalSdCardDetails
members.description: Returns details of external SD card(s): absolute path, is writable, free space.The intention of this method is to return the location and details of removable external SD cards.This differs from the "external directories" returned by cordova-plugin-file which return mount points relating to non-removable (internal) storage.Learn more about this method [here](https://github.com/dpa99c/cordova-diagnostic-plugin#getexternalsdcarddetails)

members.name: switchToWirelessSettings
members.description: Switches to the wireless settings page in the Settings app. Allows configuration of wireless controls such as Wi-Fi, Bluetooth and Mobile networks.

members.name: switchToNFCSettings
members.description: Displays NFC settings to allow user to enable NFC.

members.name: isNFCPresent
members.description: Checks if NFC hardware is present on device.

members.name: isNFCEnabled
members.description: Checks if the device setting for NFC is switched on.Note: this operation does not require NFC permission in the manifest.

members.name: isNFCAvailable
members.description: Checks if NFC is available to the app. Returns true if the device has NFC capabilities AND if NFC setting is switched on.Note: this operation does not require NFC permission in the manifest.

members.name: registerNFCStateChangeHandler
members.description: Registers a function to be called when a change in NFC state occurs. Pass in a falsey value to de-register the currently registered function.

params.name: hander
params.description: callback function to be called when NFC state changes

members.name: isCameraRollAuthorized
members.description: Checks if the application is authorized to use the Camera Roll in Photos app.

members.name: getCameraRollAuthorizationStatus
members.description: Returns the authorization status for the application to use the Camera Roll in Photos app.

members.name: requestCameraRollAuthorization
members.description: Requests camera roll authorization for the application.Should only be called if authorization status is NOT_REQUESTED.Calling it when in any other state will have no effect.

members.name: isRemoteNotificationsEnabled
members.description: Checks if remote (push) notifications are enabled.

members.name: isRegisteredForRemoteNotifications
members.description: Indicates if the app is registered for remote (push) notifications on the device.

members.name: getRemoteNotificationTypes
members.description: Indicates the current setting of notification types for the app in the Settings app.Note: on iOS 8+, if "Allow Notifications" switch is OFF, all types will be returned as disabled.

members.name: isRemindersAuthorized
members.description: Checks if the application is authorized to use reminders.

members.name: getRemindersAuthorizationStatus
members.description: Returns the reminders authorization status for the application.

members.name: requestRemindersAuthorization
members.description: Requests reminders authorization for the application.

members.name: isBackgroundRefreshAuthorized
members.description: Checks if the application is authorized for background refresh.

members.name: getBackgroundRefreshStatus
members.description: Returns the background refresh authorization status for the application.

members.name: requestBluetoothAuthorization
members.description: Requests Bluetooth authorization for the application.Learn more about this method [here](https://github.com/dpa99c/cordova-diagnostic-plugin#requestbluetoothauthorization)

members.name: isMotionAvailable
members.description: Checks if motion tracking is available on the current device.

members.name: isMotionRequestOutcomeAvailable
members.description: Checks if it's possible to determine the outcome of a motion authorization request on the current device.There's no direct way to determine if authorization was granted or denied, so the Pedometer API must be used to indirectly determine this:therefore, if the device supports motion tracking but not Pedometer Event Tracking, the outcome of requesting motion detection cannot be determined.

members.name: requestAndCheckMotionAuthorization
members.description: Requests and checks motion authorization for the application: there is no way to independently request only or check only, so both must be done in one operation.Learn more about this method [here](https://github.com/dpa99c/cordova-diagnostic-plugin#requestandcheckmotionauthorization)
